name: Box Dot Online
description:
"Box Dot Online" is an amazingly simple game based off the traditional dot and boxes game played with paper and pencil lets you now to play the classic paper and pencil game on your iPhone, iPod Touch or iPad with your friends or with millions of other people all over the world ! via the internet using Apple's Game Center, Or You can play local game with a smart Computer !, you'll always find someone to play this timeless game with !.
------------------------

The rules are extremely straightforward: each player gets to place one line per turn, when a player places a line that closes a box, they earn one point. The game ends when all the boxes have been claimed, and the player with the highest score wins.

--------------------------------

Look at the "Box Dot Online" Leaderboard to see how your skill points rank against your friends or other Players Over the world, and the rest of those playing in Game Center.

By thinking outside of the box you can make it to the top of the leaderboard as the highest ranking Box Dot Online player.

------------------------------

* Game Features :

- Multiplayer Gamecenter support over WiFi/3G .
- single player games against the computer.
- Local game in same device .
- Universal Game for iPhone/iPod touch and iPad
-No Ads .

Enjoy !
